thread.title: Motor racing-Former F1 driver De la Rosa takes on Formula E role

title: Motor racing-Former F1 driver De la Rosa takes on Formula E role

organizations.name: pedro de la rosa mandatory credit

text:
April 12, 2018 / 4:57 PM / Updated an hour ago Motor racing - Former F1 driver De la Rosa takes on Formula E role   
(Reuters) - Former Formula One driver Pedro de la Rosa has joined Chinese-owned Formula E leaders Techeetah as sporting and technical advisor. Formula One - F1 - United States Grand Prix 2012 - Circuit of the Americas, Austin, Texas, United States of America - 17/11/12 Hispania's Pedro De La Rosa Mandatory Credit: Action Images / Crispin Thruston 
The 47-year-old Spaniard, who raced in Formula One with Arrows, Jaguar, Mclaren, Sauber and HRT, will start at Saturday’s Rome ePrix. 
“Formula E has really taken off and it’s a significant and relevant addition to the international motorsport scene,” he said in a statement. Reporting by Alan Baldwin, editing by Toby Davis
